hero_text:
Here I post various information for those who want to upgrade their skills in Russian. You can listen to podcast in Russian, read texts, practice, etc.
One of the features of my page is that I frequently share information and facts from my own life!
name: Russian with Nick
paid_subscription_benefits: Hey there! You can enjoy all my posts for free on my Substack channel. If you'd like to support me, you can also choose to subsc
podcast_description:
Hi there! 
My name is Nikita or Nick.
In these podcasts I am going to give you a huge portion of topics in Russian. 
This podcast suits for those who are learning Russian.
podcast_title: Russian with Nick | Studying Russian | Topics in Russian for foreigners
author_bio: Teach Russian, make podcasts on interesting topics in Russian, exercises and so on

sections.name: Healthy lifestyle and fitness articles
sections.description: This newsletter is on various topics related to gym, nutrition, healthy habits, general fitness. All the articles I will come up with myself.

sections.name: Exercises & Crosswords
sections.description:
Are you ready to challenge your mind and break some brain cells? My crosswords are the perfect way to put your Russian language skills to the test while having fun. By participating in crossword sessions, you'll expand your vocabulary, practice grammar rules, and improve your overall fluency. 
Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your Russian language skills. Join!

sections.name: Words & Phrases
sections.description: Here I will give popular words and phrases in Russian

sections.name: Russian Books Adaptation
sections.description:
In this section, you will find books by famous Russian writers that I have personally adapted. Many of them feature such rich vocabulary that even native speakers may sometimes struggle to understand certain words. Therefore, I have adapted these books to enhance your comprehension. I will also identify the most challenging or intriguing words, provide their English translations, and place them below the text.
To better understand these books your approximate level of Russian has to be B2.
